name: 5 Nights of Basics Education
description:
Love the basis in learning and education? Now the time has come when familiar characters become what they really are.

Your task is to be careful for 5 nights in school, the basics in learning and education. Bully, director, playtime and other characters have now become very scary. They will look for you and try to leave you forever at school. As soon as you can survive 5 nights, then you will be free and run home to mommy.

Features 5 Nights of Basic Education:

- addictive gameplay that keeps you on your toes;
- scary and frightening characters;
- tense atmosphere of the game

IOS Release! Android Release!
